name: tin
description: Tin is a soft and malleable metal, prized for its natural resistance to corrosion. Its gentle sheen and ease of alloying make it a vital component in crafting a variety of decorative and functional metal blends.

allomancy.description: Enhances {PAWN}'s senses like sight, hearing, and smell.

feruchemy.description: Stores senses, dulling them while storing and enhancing while tapping.

store.description: This pawn is storing sensory perception in a tin metalmind, numbing themselves to the world. Sight and hearing are muted, impairing awareness and coordination. It’s harder to aim, react, or interact effectively — but sensory clarity is being saved for later.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a tin metalmind, flooding their body with enhanced sensory input. Their vision and hearing sharpen dramatically, improving combat awareness and task efficiency. However, overstimulation may lead to distraction or sensitivity.
